title: milkchan_episode_1_en_titles.avi
description:
This is a deluxe fan-art edition with fancy subtitles with additional text info like references to Japanese TV etc.

I wish they had all 12 episode in this format.

Most important: ***No American dubbing***

If you`ve ever seen the USA adult-swim version of Super Milk Chan, bang your head against the wall a few times in order to erase that memory and watch *this* instead. What the yanks did to poor Miruku is a crime surpassed only by the insults to king Rama V in ``The king and I``.

Please seed. As you can guess, I`m in the 3rd world where bandwidth is not an option.
